```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

```

# Load in a dataset
```{r}
##reads in a dataset using absolute path or relative path (always use a relative path!)

litters_data = read_csv(file = "./data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv")

litters_data = janitor::clean_names(litters_data)

litters_data
  
```

# Load in pups data
```{r}
pups_data = read_csv(file = "./data_import_examples/FAS_pups.csv")
pups_data = janitor::clean_names(pups_data)

```

#Read in Excel data
```{r}

library(readxl)
mlb11_data = read_excel("./data_import_examples/mlb11.xlsx")

```

#Read in SAS
```{r}
library(haven)
pulse_data = read_sas("./data_import_examples/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat")
head(pulse_data, 5)

```
